page.title: 07Travel by boat
page.content: One holiday we went around all the{Channel Islands}in our boat. The first place we went was{Cherbourg which is in{France.}This is my favourite place because you can do any thing you like in the harbour. My sister and I have got a{sailing dinghy called a{Puffin}which we sail in there. One day a gust of wind caught us and we capsized and got blown onto the beach. The people who teach sailboarding on the sand shouted at us but we could not understand them. We sailed back and I got our rubber dinghy with an engine. I was planing and broke the drivepin on the slipway. I rowed back and Dad mended it and told me to take the rubbish ashore. After that I went fishing with Johnathan and caught a fish.
